Query.syntax: Select u.* from USER u where u.userID=?
SELECT u.* from USER u, CONFFRIENDSHIP f where f.InviteeID=? and f.InviterID=u.UserID
SELECT u.* from USER u, PENDFRIENDSHIP f where f.InviteeID=? AND u.UserID = f.inviteeID
Select u.* from USER u where u.userID=?
DELETE from PENDFRIENDSHIP f where f.inviteeID=? and f.inviterID=?
DELETE from PENDFRIENDSHIP f where f.inviteeID=? and f.inviterID=?
DELETE from CONFFRIENDSHIP f where f.inviteeID=? and f.inviterID=?
SELECT * from RESOURCES r where r.walluserid=? ORDER BY r.rid DESC LIMIT 20
SELECT * from MANIPULATION m where m.rid=?
SELECT * from RESOURCES r where r.walluserid=? ORDER BY r.rid DESC LIMIT 20
DELETE from MANIPULATION m where m.mid=? AND m.rid=?
